Word_Entry.notes: is used to say thank you in Filipino
Word_Entry.hint: When I want to thank a Filipino, I'd tell them Maraming Salamat po

Word_Entry.notes: is a greeting used every noon
Word_Entry.hint: It's nice to greet everyone "Magandang tanghali po" every noon.

Word_Entry.notes: is a greeting used every afternoon
Word_Entry.hint: It's nice to greet everyone "Magandang hapon po" every afternoon.

Word_Entry.notes: is a greeting used every evening
Word_Entry.hint: It's nice to greet everyone "Magandang Gabi po" every evening.
